meanings.definition: To bring together or join into a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The students were uniting their efforts to complete the project.
meanings.sent2: The family picnic was a time for uniting and enjoying each other's company.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces were uniting in a race to see who could finish first.
meanings.sent4: The rivers uniting in the valley symbolized the merging of two communities.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's mission was uniting the city against a common enemy.

meanings.definition: The act of joining together or combining.
meanings.sent1: The uniting of the two companies created a stronger business entity.
meanings.sent2: The uniting of flavors in the dish created a unique taste experience.
meanings.sent3: The uniting of colors in the painting made it stand out in the gallery.
meanings.sent4: The uniting of voices in the choir concert was harmonious and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The uniting of efforts from all team members led to a successful project completion.
